00025 //----------------------------------------------------------
00026 GrAnimXFormCache::GrAnimXFormCache( GrModel* modelTarget )
00027 : _modelTarget( modelTarget )
00028 , _nodeTargets( 0 )
00029 , _xformCache( 0 )
00030 , _bindPose( 0 )
00031 , _xformCount( 0 )
00032 {
00033         BuildArrays();
00034 }
00035 
00036 //----------------------------------------------------------
00037 GrAnimXFormCache::~GrAnimXFormCache()
00038 {
00039         Clean();
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 //==========================================================
00045 //==========================================================
00046 
00047 //----------------------------------------------------------
00048 void
00049 GrAnimXFormCache::SetTarget( GrModel* modelTarget )
00050 {
00051         Clean();
00052         _modelTarget = modelTarget;
00053         BuildArrays();
00054 }
00055 
00056 //----------------------------------------------------------
00057 unsigned int
00058 GrAnimXFormCache::GetXFormIdx( const tstring& name )
00059 {
00060         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _xformCount; ++i )
00061         {
00062                 if ( _nodeTargets[ i ]->GetName() == name )
00063                         return i;
00064         }
00065 
00067         return ~0;
00068 }
00069 
00070 //----------------------------------------------------------
00071 void
00072 GrAnimXFormCache::AccumXForm( unsigned int idx, const GrAnimXForm& xform )
00073 {
00074         B_ASSERT( idx < _xformCount );
00075         _xformCache[ idx ].Accumulate( xform );
00076 }
00077 
00078 //----------------------------------------------------------
00079 void
00080 GrAnimXFormCache::ApplyToTarget()
00081 {
00082         MMat4x4 mat;
00083         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _xformCount; ++i )
00084         {
00085                 _xformCache[ i ].BuildMatrix( mat );
00086                 _nodeTargets[ i ]->SetLocal( _bindPose[ i ] * mat );
00087                 _xformCache[ i ].SetToIdentity();
00088         }
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 //==========================================================
00094 //==========================================================
00095 
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------
00097 void
00098 GrAnimXFormCache::BuildArrays()
00099 {
00101         GrModelNode* root = _modelTarget->GetRootNode();
00102         unsigned int nodeCount = CountNodes( root );
00103 
00105         _xformCount = 0;
00106         _nodeTargets = new GrModelNode*[ nodeCount ];
00107         RecordTargets( root );
00108 
00110         _xformCache = new GrAnimXForm[ nodeCount ];
00111         _bindPose = new MMat4x4[ nodeCount ];
00112 
00113         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < nodeCount; ++i )
00114                 _bindPose[ i ] = _nodeTargets[ i ]->GetLocal();
00115 }
00116 
00117 //----------------------------------------------------------
00118 unsigned int
00119 GrAnimXFormCache::CountNodes( GrModelNode* tree )
00120 {
00121         unsigned int count = 1;
00122         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < tree->GetChildCount(); ++i )
00123                 count += CountNodes( tree->GetChild( i ) );
00124         return count;
00125 }
00126 
00127 //----------------------------------------------------------
00128 void
00129 GrAnimXFormCache::RecordTargets( GrModelNode* tree )
00130 {
00132         _nodeTargets[ _xformCount++ ] = tree;
00133         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < tree->GetChildCount(); ++i )
00134                 RecordTargets( tree->GetChild( i ) );
00135 }
00136 
00137 //----------------------------------------------------------
00138 void
00139 GrAnimXFormCache::Clean()
00140 {
00141         delete[] _nodeTargets;
00142         delete[] _xformCache;
00143         delete[] _bindPose;
00144         _nodeTargets = 0;
00145         _xformCache = 0;
00146         _bindPose = 0;
00147 }
